text: made a 84 return in nem in less than 40 days so this video is going to walk you through a Rao called diagonal position that I put on in neem and I want to walk you through essentially how I've managed the trade it's been a while since I've done one of these trade deep Dives so this one's not going to be edited we're just going to get straight into details and start working through the position so here's in a nutshell what played out on the 4th of March happy old birthday to myself I guess I gave myself a gift I saw NM starting to break out in a pretty big way and it popped up on one of my alerts and this is where I entered the trade now what's the origin of all of this it's kind of simple and I've been talking about this stuff on my YouTube lives actually for quite a while and it's the rotation that we're seeing still from Capital tied up in things like if I zoom this out a little bit more like 6 months you can see that on a longer term time frame it communication Services these have been killing it for the last year plus and definitely within the last six months but if you take a look at some of these shorter term time frames like if we go here to 3 months you'll notice that energy materials Industrials starting to creep up

text: Services these have been killing it for the last year plus and definitely within the last six months but if you take a look at some of these shorter term time frames like if we go here to 3 months you'll notice that energy materials Industrials starting to creep up towards the top a little bit if we go into one month you'll also see that we still see energy running at the top materials still down towards the bottom but it's important to click within materials because metals and Mining has been doing a great job for some time so you can see metals and Mining is actually up 15 as compared to some of the other sub sectors of materials that are struggling so because I've started catching some of this rotation of capital into these other products especially against the broader inflationary environment that we're in I became really interested so NE popped up on on one of my scans and I decided uh to essentially just watch it and I didn't like it here at all so what I ended up doing was setting an alert right here at 3131 and it's just because this is kind of where I saw near-term resistance if we started to get some sort of pullback and we started to see a little bit of Life come through it's hard to see because it's kind of suppressed but you can actually see that volume on these updats started to expand

text: use use this expiration or this expiration this moving average as my exit which is just a 9 or a 10 day 10 day so that led me to today where we fell off a bit I see the candle today it still looked pretty strong really light volume though I didn't love that so as I saw the day unfolding I ended up exiting today because it's at a good profit my next stop as you can see was moved up here to 3777 and the probability of this channeling sideways for a little bit before it regains some steam is moderate in my opinion and this realizes a pretty decent amount of profit right out of the gate so what I ended up doing was offloading all 50 of the 30 calls and again I bought them for an average of 455 and I ended up selling them for 910 average today so that takes the realized pl on the long call to 22765 less the 3550 from the short calls so that takes the total pl of the trade to 19,25 which is an 84.5 return on invested Capital so a couple notes that I want to highlight here specifically is I still think this rotation is likely in play however it might slow down a little bit with the current rate environment dragging out as it is and it wouldn't surprise me to see Capital starting to rotate back into Tech which is something that I'm

text: highlight here specifically is I still think this rotation is likely in play however it might slow down a little bit with the current rate environment dragging out as it is and it wouldn't surprise me to see Capital starting to rotate back into Tech which is something that I'm keeping an eye on however we're at a really interesting Market position especially whenever we end up getting closer to this rate cut actually happening I think that you'll see things like this start to move even more still but this was a way essentially for me to gain exposure to Gold because this is one of the largest gold miners and it came up on a couple of my alerts so that was the trade I have a few others that I've actually talked to the Community about in different products but this one I thought was interesting because of two things one the mistake I made here and two because this is something that it was actually coming up on my time Horizon to manage this trade because it wasn't performing and I got a decent move it was running a small profit but it wasn't moving enough in order for it to make sense but I gave it just enough time that it started to pop out for me which is again ideally what we wanted to see here so that's the trade if you have any questions or anything that you want me to dive into
